title: Hebrew Bible in English - Ten Commandments 2/3 and Exodus 20
description:
Second in a three part series on the revelation of the Ten Commandments on Mount Sinai. Exodus 20.

Join us on the Discord server. https://discord.gg/87z7sFcV
